reviews.review: Обалденная игра залипаю по вечерам с друзьями. Даже на моей микровалновке летает.

this games is perfect
                                                                       [h1] PORTAL 2 [/h1]

it expand every thing about portal one for the better

[b] game play [/b] you learn to do new things in every puzzle and every puzzle is unique and will combine the things you learn in one taste .
[b] soundtrack [/b] the soundtrack is amazing. in some levels the music will interact with your movement .
[b] characters [/b] wheatley is GLaDOS level good the rest of characters are pretty good too .
[b] story [/b] story is amazing you have to experience it yourself + very good humor .
and a very good graphics and map design .
+ you have a 27 page comic

                                                                          [h1] CO-OP [/h1]

you always wish to work with your friend or partner .
will wish no more my friend. now you can be partner in science . 
and test in a series of six rooms each of them have six courses .
taste your bonds while GLaDOS make you turn on each other .

                                                                       [h1] workshop [/h1]

you finish the story and co-op and there is nothing to do .
will don't worry my fellow scientist .
you can download levels from the workshop high quality levels .
like 

                                                                        [h1] conclusion [/h1]

portal 2 is an amazing experience .
with lovable story , characters and music .
for me it's a [b] masterpiece 10/10 [/b]
buy the {portal Bundle} when it goes on sale.
[b] i hop you have fun playing it [spoiler] you monster [/spoiler]
 [/b]
es un juego execelente unos de mis preferidos llevo como 3 años jugandolo y en pocas palabras es hermoso

This is an awesome game with fun, puzzling gameplay, a great sense of humor and some nice music. Too many games these days take themselves way too seriously, this is a refreshing turn away from that.

One of my all time favorite games.

Oynadığım en iyi fps oyunuydu açıkcası. Portal mekaniği gerçekten çok hoş ve ilk oyuna göre hikaye sunumu ve bulmacalar gelişmiş durumda. Oyun motoru sayesinde portal silahının kullanımı çok rahat karakteri kontrol etmekte çok rahat. Grafikleri 2021 yılında bile göze batmıyor gayet iyi grafikleri var. Bulmaca olarak tabi ki The Legend of Zelda serisi kadar olamaz ama Zelda serisinden sonra oynadığım bulmaca odaklı en iyi seri idi portal ve portal 2. Oyuna puanım 100/90

Is it better than Portal, the best puzzle game ever made? Yes. Yes it is. Portal 2 takes everything that Portal got right, and makes it better. Witty AI character? Have two. Two hour story? This one takes eight. All sorts of clever test chambers, new puzzle types (light bridges, gels, and faith plates, amongst other things,) and a super engaging story make Portal 2 one of the best games ever made.
спасибо очень интересная игра, но почему папичу она не понравилась

Do you like potatoes? Of course you do. Imagine a world where Valve doesn't make Half Life 3 and makes other games instead. It's kind of like that except it is just like that. Oh and you can play as Gordon Freeman.  Well no you can't, but you can dress up as Gordon Freeman and play the game. It's terrific!!

Or you can dress up as a potato. Ya. You can dress up as a potato and play the game. Incredible game design. Don't miss it!

Instant Classic!

Oh and if your PC is a potato, it will most likely be able to play this game.  And it will still be pretty.  Maybe.

All hail potatoes!!!
Esta re bueno pa jugar con tus amigos y conocer personas que probablemente quieras o odies, es un rompecabezas muy bueno y detallado pra estar hecho en 2011 10/10
einfach genial mehr kann man nicht sagen

Por fin me lo acabe y ya puedo hacerle una reseña mas o menos seria y no mierdas tipo ''cuando yola vi'' o contando sueños bizarros , una reseña para recomendar este titulo , especialmente si te gustan los juegos de puzles.
En este juego controlamos a una piba que tiene que realizar una serie de pruebas usando una pistola de portales tridimensionales , en las cuales debemos sacar a relucir nuestro coeficiente intelectual , a lo largo del juego se irán añadiendo elementos nuevos que darán variedad y dificultad a las pruebas, esa es la premisa de portal , pero seguramente aquellos que no lo jugaron se preguntarán ¿se ejecutó bien en esta segunda entrega? 
respuesta corta: Sí
respuesta larga: En general sí , las pruebas son muy creativas y originales , las justas y necesarias que hacen que el juego no se haga repetitivo o excesivamente largo , lo cual acaba desembocando en una duración corta de 14 horas a lo mucho, contando la campaña cooperativa , porque si , este juego tiene 3 modos de juego , la campaña individual , una campaña cooperativa extra igual de buena que la principal y un creador de pruebas que permite tanto crear tus propios niveles y publicarlos como jugar niveles que publicaron otras personas , lo cual aumenta la duración del juego.
Los diálogos del juego son sorprendentemente buenos  , la historia tiene algún giro de guion que te gira el ano ,las pocas canciones que hay son buenas, los gráficos han envejecido muy bien ... En fin, queda claro que poco se le puede reprochar , quizás lo único que mejoraría es que en el tramo final la dificultad se basa en colocar los elementos importantes en lugares poco visibles como ya escuche decir a otras personas , pero no jode la experiencia ni mucho menos.
Por si no quedo claro , lo recomiendo , esta bien de precio (sobre todo en oferta que cuesta poco mas de 2 euros) , ademas no tendrás problemas en moverlo aunque tu ordenador sea pura patraña con semen en la gpu , si no lo juegas es porque no quieres , asi que bro no se a que esperas , le doy un 8/10
One of the wittiest and enjoyable games ever. Still holds up 10 years later.

A great game with great destruction and wonderful gameplay and story. definitely worth it

I originally played this game on the PS3 and I don’t know how many times I played it (over and over again) but playing this game years later on the PC was the closest thing I’ll ever have to re-experiencing it for the first time again save from wiping my own memory just for that experience. 

An absolute classic, one of the best games ever made.

This game is amazing. I love the puzzles, love the characters, love the story, I think the whole thing is nice and it does a few callbacks to Portal 1 in a few Easter Eggs and mentions. I can say this definitely feels like a nice successor to Portal 1, and it feels like practically all ages could play it too. It's also nice how it fills in the gaps of missing lore that you didn't completely get in Portal 1. It's all relatively nice.

funny ball guy does a thing and stuff happens

10/10 cool story and hard puzzles

Very fun. I kinda wanna know what comes next after we escape though. Maybe we need to solve puzzles/parkour and things like the tests we were doing before. And maybe we are solving them to try to reach a civilisation or some other humans or something. I don't know. I think that could be cool. And maybe we will befriend another robot and learn some of our backstory along the way. There's a lot of potential for a Portal 3 is all I'm sayin. Over all it was very very fun. After a while though, near the end some of the levels got a little annoying, kind of monotonous. Still fun though. HIGHLY recommend if you enjoy puzzles and figuring stuff out! (Also, I miss wheatley but I know he ain't comin back anytime soon. Or is he? I don't know, I'm just a simple tester.)

I liked how the surroundings and funny things in this game as well as the co-op testing in this game but I didn't like how some of the puzzles are hard in this game but thankfully I was smart enough to get through them.
This game has fun puzzle mechanics, and is funny. I mean it's not that complicated to explain, its a fun game.
Es simplemente excelente, una secuela que recicla todo lo bueno y expande el lore.

Потрясающая игра, которую вы запомните надолго. Геймплей заключается в максимально простой механике - 2 портала в один входишь из второго выходишь. Сама игра представляет из себя головоломку, которую решать как минимум интересно. В игре присутствует юмор. Причём очень качественный. Сюжет конечно не "Назад в будущее" но очень интригующий, за которым интересно наблюдать. Меня удивило что русский дубляж сохранил эстетику оригинала. Бывают косяки но они не значительны. Это именно тот дубляж который можно назвать "Локализацией". И даже сейчас игра играется очень бодро. Графика приемлема, глаза не режет. В игре присутствует кооператив. Причем не просто слово "Кооператив", а самая настоящая командная игра, в которую будет весело поиграть с друзьями. Ачивки не самые тяжёлые но и не простые. Хотите выполнить все? Придётся попотеть. По сравнению с оригинальной Portal 2007 года, эта игра настоящий прорыв если не индустрии то для Valve это уж точно. Рекомендую к прохождению. 9/10
